name: Absorb (pixelideen)
description:
In Absorb, the player has 42 seconds to absorb geometric shapes. In each case, the player must absorb the shape that he also owns. For each absorbed figure, the player is credited with some time, which can be used to extend the game. A local highscore is built up, with which one can compete. 

If you find the game fun and enjoyable, I'd love to hear your comments.
